

---
title: "What's the Relationship Between # of Lines and # of Functions in Different Languages?"
subtitle: "Comparing "
output: html_document
---


library(ggplot2)

data = read.csv("../bin/PythonFiles/Stats/python_stats.csv")
colnames(data) <- c("Lines","FunctionDefs")
length(data$Lines)
#240 python programs
plt = ggplot(data,aes(Lines,FunctionDefs))+
  geom_point(color="steelblue",size=1)+
  geom_vline(xintercept=mean(data$Lines),colour="red",linetype="dashed")+
   geom_hline(yintercept=mean(data$FunctionDefs),colour="red",linetype="dashed")+
  ggtitle("Python Programs")+
  xlab("Number of Lines")+
  ylab("Number of Function Definitions")+
  theme_bw()
plt
ggsave("Python.png",plt)

mean(data$FunctionDef)
mean(data$Lines)

cor(data$FunctionDef,data$Lines)
data2 = data[data$FunctionDef>=10 & data$Lines>=200,]
cor(data2$FunctionDefs,data2$Lines)
